context.rdfs:comment: A trip on a commercial bus line.
context.rdfs:label: BusTrip

properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the bus (e.g. Bolt Express).

properties.rdfs:comment: The stop or station from which the bus departs.

properties.rdfs:comment: The stop or station from which the bus arrives.

properties.rdfs:comment: The unique identifier for the bus.
properties.rdfs:label: busNumber
